languages.text: "Они лишь исполнили свое предназначение. Я предвидел каждую гибель, каждый предсмертный всхлип, каждую зияющую рану. Весь этот океан крови пролился по моей воле, ради сего момента — моего воплощения и твоего прибытия сюда, к своему месту подле меня, Дитя Рассвета".

"They have merely fulfilled their purpose. I foresaw every death, every last gasp, every gaping wound. All that ocean of blood was spilt at my will, for the sake of this moment, for me to be incarnated and for you to arrive here and take your place beside me, Child of the Dawn."
languages.original_text: "Они лишь исполнили свое предназначение. Я предвидел каждую гибель, каждый предсмертный всхлип, каждую зияющую рану. Весь этот океан крови пролился по моей воле, ради сего момента — моего воплощения и твоего прибытия сюда, к своему месту подле меня, Дитя Рассвета".

All that ocean of blood was spilt at my will, for the sake of this moment — for me to be incarnated and for you to arrive here and take your place beside me, Child of the Dawn."

traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: “他们仅仅是完成了他们存在的目的。我预见到了他们每个人的死亡，每次喘息，以及每个裂开的伤口。所有的鲜血与死亡，都是在我的意愿之下播撒出来的。一切都是为了这一刻，为了我化身于此，为了你来到这里，来到我身边，黎明之子。”
languages.original_text: "They have merely fulfilled their purpose. I foresaw every death, every last gasp, every gaping wound. All that ocean of blood was spilt at my will, for the sake of this moment, for me to be incarnated and for you to arrive here and take your place beside me, Child of the Dawn."

traits.locale_text: “他们仅仅是完成了他们存在的目的。我预见到了他们每个人的死亡，每次喘息，以及每个裂开的伤口。所有的鲜血与死亡，都是在我的意愿之下播撒出来的。一切都是为了这一刻，为了我化身于此，为了你来到这里，来到我身边，黎明之子。”
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: "Sie haben lediglich ihren Zweck erfüllt. Ich habe jeden Tod vorhergesehen, jedes noch so kleine Keuchen, jede klaffende Wunde. Dieser gesamte Ozean des Bluts wurde durch meinen Willen vergossen, nur um dieses Augenblicks willen, damit ich Fleisch werde und damit Ihr hier eintrefft und Euren Platz an meiner Seite einnehmt, Kind der Dämmerung."
languages.original_text: "They have merely fulfilled their purpose. I foresaw every death, every last gasp, every gaping wound. All that ocean of blood was spilt at my will, for the sake of this moment, for me to be incarnated and for you to arrive here and take your place beside me, Child of the Dawn."

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben lediglich ihren Zweck erfüllt. Ich habe jeden Tod vorhergesehen, jedes noch so kleine Keuchen, jede klaffende Wunde. Dieser gesamte Ozean des Bluts wurde durch meinen Willen vergossen, nur um dieses Augenblicks willen, damit ich Fleisch werde und damit Ihr hier eintrefft und Euren Platz an meiner Seite einnehmt, Kind der Dämmerung."
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: «No han hecho más que cumplir con su cometido. He vaticinado cada muerte, cada estertor, cada herida abierta. Todo ese océano de sangre se ha derramado porque así lo he querido, para propiciar este encuentro, para que yo pueda reencarnarme y tú ocupes el lugar que te corresponde a mi lado, Vástago del Amanecer».
languages.original_text: "They have merely fulfilled their purpose. I foresaw every death, every last gasp, every gaping wound. All that ocean of blood was spilt at my will, for the sake of this moment, for me to be incarnated and for you to arrive here and take your place beside me, Child of the Dawn."

traits.locale_text: «No han hecho más que cumplir con su cometido. He vaticinado cada muerte, cada estertor, cada herida abierta. Todo ese océano de sangre se ha derramado porque así lo he querido, para propiciar este encuentro, para que yo pueda reencarnarme y tú ocupes el lugar que te corresponde a mi lado, Vástago del Amanecer».
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: « Ils n'ont fait que remplir leur fonction. J'avais prévu chaque mort, chaque râle d'agonie, chaque plaie béante. Ce bain de sang, c'est moi qui l'ai voulu dans la perspective de cet instant précis, afin que je m'incarne et que vous veniez prendre votre place à mes côtés, enfant de l'Aube. »
languages.original_text: "They have merely fulfilled their purpose. I foresaw every death, every last gasp, every gaping wound. All that ocean of blood was spilt at my will, for the sake of this moment, for me to be incarnated and for you to arrive here and take your place beside me, Child of the Dawn."

traits.locale_text: « Ils n'ont fait que remplir leur fonction. J'avais prévu chaque mort, chaque râle d'agonie, chaque plaie béante. Ce bain de sang, c'est moi qui l'ai voulu dans la perspective de cet instant précis, afin que je m'incarne et que vous veniez prendre votre place à mes côtés, enfant de l'Aube.
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: 「彼らは目的を果たしただけだ。私はすべての死、最後の息、そして大きく開いた傷口を予見していた。血の海はすべて私の意志で流された。この瞬間のために、私が肉体を持つために、そしてお前がここに到着し、私の隣に座るためだ。暁の子よ」
languages.original_text: "They have merely fulfilled their purpose. I foresaw every death, every last gasp, every gaping wound. All that ocean of blood was spilt at my will, for the sake of this moment, for me to be incarnated and for you to arrive here and take your place beside me, Child of the Dawn."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは目的を果たしただけだ。私はすべての死、最後の息、そして大きく開いた傷口を予見していた。血の海はすべて私の意志で流された。この瞬間のために、私が肉体を持つために、そしてお前がここに到着し、私の隣に座るためだ。暁の子よ」
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: "Yalnızca amaçlarına hizmet ettiler. Bu an uğruna yaşanan her bir ölümü, verilen her bir son nefesi, açılan yaraların hepsini öngördüm... Benim cisim bulmam ve senin buraya varıp benim saflarımda yerini alman için yaşanan her şeyi gördüm Şafak Evladı."
languages.original_text: "They have merely fulfilled their purpose. I foresaw every death, every last gasp, every gaping wound. All that ocean of blood was spilt at my will, for the sake of this moment, for me to be incarnated and for you to arrive here and take your place beside me, Child of the Dawn."
